revised_title: Satellite Doppler Tracking and Geodetic Applications: I.G.N.'s Contributions
tldr: The authors from the Institut Géographique National (I.G.N.) discuss their work in satellite Doppler tracking and its geodetic applications. They describe the development and use of portable receivers, data processing methods, and various geodetic applications, such as gravity field studies, polar motion, and geophysical parameter measurements.
